product.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
product.description: A classic Italian dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper. Rich, creamy, and comforting.

product.name: Caesar Salad
product.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and freshly grated Parmesan cheese.

product.name: Margherita Pizza
product.description: Classic pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves. A taste of Italy in every bite.

product.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
product.description: Decadent chocolate cake with a molten center. Served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
